name: Purifier
description:
Description

Purifier is a 3D Top Down shooter game. In this wave based top down shooter, you should purify the corruption in the OFFICE?

Shoot the corrupted figures and purify the OFFICE

Upgrade you abilities after each wave to gain more power.

Collect health pickups to stay alive.

10 waves with a Final Epic Boss Battle.

Made for Ludum Dare 47.

Features online Leaderboard.

This game might not be balanced at all.

If the game is lagging, reduce the graphics quality using the in-game settings menu.

Engine : Unreal Engine 4
